description: This file defines the IOttServices interface in the WPEFramework exchange namespace. It exposes methods for pinging the service, managing permissions, and interacting with permissions cache, intended for COMRPC communication.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface for OttServices plugin, providing permission management and service ping functionality via COMRPC.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Echoes a message and replies with a pong-style response.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a specified application as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for a given application identifier.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Refreshes the permissions cache for a specified application and returns the number of permissions updated.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
